chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: Peergreen Control Center Console standalone version could be downloaded from here. This archive includes a Peergreen Server Tomcat Profile.
If you already installed a Peergreen Server, download Peergreen Console Kernel and Peergreen Control Center Console and copy them inside deploy/ directory where your Peergreen Server is running.
Visit Peergreen Web Console download page for more information.
Now, Peergreen web console is well installed. You can check by typing lb command in server shell and see that the bundle was correctly installed :
chapter.screen:
admin@peergreen-platform$ lb
... 45|Active | 1|Peergreen Console Kernel (1.0.0.SNAPSHOT) 46|Active | 1|Peergreen Control Center Console (1.0.0.SNAPSHOT) ...
chapter.para: Peergreen Control Center Console is available under the context /admin. Go to your favorite web browser and type http://localhost:9000/admin .
